chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
yes
alright! i'm at the starting point now
there's a twig to my left leading to an island with a tiger. what's my next move, amigo?
foward
genial! estoy en la misma posición de inicio junto a un pequeño ramita que lleva a una isla con un tigre
¿hacia dónde voy ahora?
go to the parrot
¡perfecto! estoy yendo al suroeste del tigre ahora
estoy viendo a un loro sentado en un árbol en una isla grande. ¿sigo adelante desde aquí?
yes
nickel plated! I see three rocks that lead to a new island with a frog
Is that where I'm headed?
speak in english only please, and yes go to the frog
oops! sorry about that
alright, now i'm at the frog. what's next, boss?
go past the crocodile
okay, i went past the crocodile and now i'm looking at the big island with our elephant friend again
where to now?
the giraffe now
Muy bien, ahora estoy en la jirafa.
¿En qué dirección ahora?
go past the snake
ran past that slithery snake, and now i'm two steps away from our treasure! shall i go ahead and grab it?
yes!
¡eres un genio! Tengo el tesoro ahora
*finalizado*! ¿Jugamos otra ronda o terminamos por hoy?
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yes, english please
absolutely! okay, first things first. walk a bit left, under the wooden bench
don't continue straight though, make a sharp u-turn crossing that trail and let's head back towards our white doggy friend. rough, let's go!
okay I think I did it
well done! now, see that branch? cross right over it, and carry on straight down the map
there's another white doggie chilling by a picnic blanket, head on down there
okay I am on the blanket
nice! now stroll your way west, brushing past those tasty lookin' berries
mmm. berry nice!
what berries?  is it on the blanket?
oh, my bad! yep, they are indeed on the blanket
slide on over them and keep moving to the west
okay I passed them
¡perfecto! ¿Notas ese ramal de madera que conduce al norte y cruza el río? vamos a repasarlo
english please
¡culpa mía! ¡lo lamento! Ahora, ¿encontraste esa rama de madera que va hacia el norte y cruza el río? vamos a repasarlo
okay what next
great! now, directly across the river, you'll see a green bush
but don't touch! we're going to circle it from the right side
okay now what
super! keep going until you reach the florist stand
you with me so far?
okay there
¡buen trabajo! Ahora, gire a la izquierda (oeste), pase por debajo de la tribuna y diríjase hacia ese gran puente con ciclistas.
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes
alright, mate
i'm at the tent up north. where to now?
go straight down until you see brown trail, under the dog but stay on brown trail
Ok, ya pasé al perro y estoy en el sendero marrón.
¿que sigue?
go up and around the fire, then back down to brown trail under the mushrooms
se enfrió, rodeó el fuego y regresó al sendero marrón bajo el hongo rojo
¿Hacia dónde ahora?
stay on the brown trail and stay right of the telescope
I am on the brown path to the right side of the telescope
what is the next move?
go past the left side of the big bush
gotcha, mate
i passed the bush on the left. what next?
go straight down to the brown trail
aight, i'm back on the brown trail heading south
now what?
go a little left until you past  the two big rocks connecting
done, i've passed between those big rocks
what do i do next?
go straight up, then take a left toward the cabin
derecha, hacia arriba y luego a la izquierda hacia la cabina.
Oye, veo la casa, ¡la logré! *finalizado*
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes, english please
great! let's start. so first, head towards the south-west going under the first palm tree
now, turn right, pass the second tree and just before that third tree, hook a sharp left heading south. how's that going?
okay I think I did it, I am south near third palm tree
¡impresionante! Ahora debes moverte hacia la izquierda de un cachorrito marrón.
gire ligeramente a la izquierda y luego a la derecha para seguir en dirección sur. ¿Qué sigue, verdad?
English please
oops, sorry about that! next, slide between this big rock on your left and the small pebble on your right, towards the water up ahead
you got this!
okay I am right before the water
¡gran trabajo! Ahora, sumérgete en el agua y ve hacia ese gran cangrejo rojo.
Una vez que esté frente a ti, es hora de girar a la derecha y seguir la gran roca en tu lado terrestre. ¡Continúa hacia el oeste, lo estás haciendo genial!
English please
oh, mi mal otra vez
Una vez que estés frente al gran cangrejo rojo, gira a la derecha y sigue por la orilla de la gran roca. ¡Sigue hacia el oeste, lo estás matando!
English please
oh, my mistake again! after you see the big red crab, turn right, continue along the big rock and keep heading west
you're doing awesome!
okay I past the big rock
¡excelente! Ahora continúa hasta que veas la roca mediana.
Una vez allí, prepárate para hacer un giro brusco hacia la derecha en el agua cuando veas un tiburón.
English please
sorry, got carried away! so once you see a medium rock, get ready to make a sharp turn right in the water when you spot a shark
you're crushing it!
okay I am with the shark
awesome dude! now, let's get back to land between the medium rock and a colorful ball, then head north
keep up the good work!
okay now what
sweet! next, veer slightly left and navigate towards the direction of the northwest
you'll see a red tent on your left and a huge speaker on your right, just squeeze through them

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
